translations: （表示突然的重击声）嘭，砰；（表示突然）蓦地；砰（表示某物击中另一物）

sentences.sentence: Then I met someone and wham, bam, I was completely in love.
sentences.translation: 然后我遇上了一个人，嘭的一下，我就恋爱了。

sentences.sentence: BAM can also help when something goes wrong.
sentences.translation: 在出现错误时， BAM 还可以提供帮助。

sentences.sentence: In other words, bam! All of a sudden you had language.
sentences.translation: 换句话说，砰！ 突然之间你有了语言。
